instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00928 Kernel panic after sleep
threads.message:
Board came in from another shop with liquid damage and already messed with.

Mac had problems with audio codec and critical update, both got repaired, but now sometimes when the Mac enters sleep and you wake it up it goes into kernel panic and shuts down, this doesn't happen all the time but we have seen it for sure.

threads.title: 820-00928 Kernel panic after sleep
threads.message:
If is random problem, turns into really nightmare; considering liquid damage and previous repair attempt in other service.

You should monitor lid signals, when the problem appears.

threads.title: 820-00928 Kernel panic after sleep
threads.message: That's that I was thinking, thanks for the advice.
